name: X-plane-teensy-ufcp
tagline: Arduino source code, PCB layouts and full documentation on a Teensy++ based Autopilot panel for fighters in X-Plane 10.30+
body: Project uses a single Teensy 2.0++ controller to imitate the advanced autopilot options found in fighter jets.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
